p: The available therapeutic treatment for infection caused by the hepatitis C virus have many adverse effects (Headache, fatigue, nausea, diarrhea, depression, hemolytic anemia) [ 29, 30, 31] and the cost of twelve-week treatment amounts to approximately $84,000 [ 32]. Researchers are focusing on synthesizing new compounds using coumarin and its derivatives to overcome the shortcomings associated with anti-HCV drugs [ 33].
